title: Jesus.. stop putting me with 4 mans.

replies.body: Get a duo friend. Two people can't possibly join with a 4 man.

> [{quoted}](name=YossarianLives,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rOBE1reG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-04T17:13:38.860+0000)
>
> Get a duo friend. Two people can't possibly join with a 4 man.

I don't get along with other humans, unless my cat can play not gonna happen.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=rOBE1reG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-05T12:39:45.468+0000)
>
> I don't get along with other humans, unless my cat can play not gonna happen.

idk, sounds like its worth a try ;) log your cat in and see if he plays better than a 4 man team. I'm guessing he will
playing with one man can hurt you let alone 4 you know what i mean XD

> mans

Mans ain't a word.

Men sounds more "mature".
